item.description:
Friday ~ February 18, 2011

Doors 7PM ~ Show 8PM

The James Montgomery Blues Band

Grand Opening Party

The Back Page
(Behind The Blue Taleh)
15 Kearney Square, Lowell, MA 01852
TEL: 978-455-4418
http://www.backpagelowell.com

Tickets $15 at The Door 1st Come 1st Serve

Blues Harmonica Legend James Montgomery kicks an intimate Grand Opening Party for Lowell's newest live music and comedy venue, the "Back Page."

When Blues Legend James Montgomery plays the harmonica, he "brings it on home." Whether it's recording with Kid Rock, sitting in with Gregg Allman, or fronting his hot band of over thirty years, Montgomery plays with authority. While growing up in Detroit he learned first-hand from the masters - James Cotton, John Lee Hooker, and Jr. Wells at the legendary "Chessmate." Over the years, he's carried on the tradition and continues to be a vital presence in Blues as one of the most dynamic performers on the music scene.

 http://www.reverbnation.com/jamesmontgomeryblues
  
http://www.myspace.com/jamesmontgomeryblues
